original_text: and from east of the Jordan, from Reuben, Gad and the half-tribe of Manasseh, armed with every type of weapon—120,000.
korean_text: 요단 저편 르우벤 자손과 갓 자손과 므낫세 반 지파 중에서 모든 무기를 가지고 능히 싸우는 자가 십이만 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: and from east of the Jordan
from Reuben, Gad and the half-tribe of Manasseh
sentences.korean_translation: 르우벤, 갓 그리고 므낫세 반 지파로부터

sentences.original_text: armed with every type of weapon
